meanings: a safe bolt hole[hideaway] for refugees
make a tour of refugee camps

examples.korean: He is light and hope to the refugees. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 피난민들에게 그는 태양과 같은 존재다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: A lot of refugees are dying of hunger. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 많은 피난민들이 굶어 죽어가고 있다. Neungyule

examples.korean: The refugees are in a wretched plight. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 피난민들이 사는 꼴이란 비참하다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The house of refuge is full of refugees. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 양육원은 피난민들로 가득 차있다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The house of refuge is full of refugees. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They dispensed medical supplies to the refugees. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 피난민들에게 의약품을 나누어 주었다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
